DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety grazoprevir ( MK-5172 ) 100 mg combination elbasvir ( MK-8742 ) 50 mg treatment chronic hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) participants co-infected human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) . The primary hypothesis percentage participant receive grazoprevir + elbasvir achieve Sustained Virologic Response 12 week therapy ( SVR12 ) great 70 % .
